text: Desmond prefers dark mode in every coding tool and dashboard.
Desmond uses vim keybindings in editors and terminal tools.
Desmond's favorite dinner is spicy salmon sushi.
The recurring strategy meeting is every Tuesday at 10:30 AM Pacific.
The codename for the new memory launch is NovaHelix.
Desmond is traveling to Seattle next month for a systems conference.
Lo-fi instrumental playlists help Desmond focus during deep work.
